product_name: FOREOLUNA 4 Smart Facial Cleansing & Firming Device for Sensitive Skin
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingFOREO's LUNA 4 Smart Facial Cleansing & Firming Device for Sensitive Skin is a customizable tool that lifts away dirt, oil, and makeup residue and offers firming facial massages that leave the skin clean and visibly healthier.
details: DetailsBenefitsPersonalized cleanseRelaxing T-Sonic pulsationsUltra-hygienic siliconeApp-guided firming massagesExtreme battery lifeManual cleansing and firming massage mode optionsSofter on skin & easier to travelProfessionally tailored massagesResearch ResultsClinically proven to remove 99% of dirt, oil & makeup residue100% of users report more refreshed and radiant skin98% of users report skin feels smoother and softer35x more hygienic than brushes with nylon bristles86% of users report skin looks & feels firmer and more elastic90% of users report healthier-looking skin81% of users report reduced appearance of blemishesIncludesLUNA 4 Sensitive Skin DeviceDrawstring Carrying BagUSB Charging CordItem 2606007How To UseUNLOCK DEVICE:Start by unlocking your device and registering your warranty via the FOREO For You app.APPLY CLEANSER:Dampen your face and apply your regular face cleanser. For optimal results. Then wet LUNA 4.SELECT PREFERENCES:Press the universal button to turn on your device. You can choose between Gentle, Regular or Deep Cleanse modes using the buttons on the device, for different areas of your face and neck.CLEANSE:Glide the silicone touchpoints on the front of LUNA 4 in circular motions over your face/neck until skin is cleansed. Once finished, press the universal button to turn off your device, (or it will automatically turn off after 1 min). Then rinse face/neck and device.IngredientsBody-Safe Silicone, ABS Plastic, Li-ion Polymer Battery 520 mah 3.7V.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: UNLOCK DEVICE:Start by unlocking your device and registering your warranty via the FOREO For You app.APPLY CLEANSER:Dampen your face and apply your regular face cleanser. For optimal results. Then wet LUNA 4.SELECT PREFERENCES:Press the universal button to turn on your device. You can choose between Gentle, Regular or Deep Cleanse modes using the buttons on the device, for different areas of your face and neck.CLEANSE:Glide the silicone touchpoints on the front of LUNA 4 in circular motions over your face/neck until skin is cleansed. Once finished, press the universal button to turn off your device, (or it will automatically turn off after 1 min). Then rinse face/neck and device.

reviews.headline: so good
reviews.comments: I got this brush as a gift, because I kept claiming that my hands are enough when it comes to skin cleansing, but I was wrong. It most definitely makes a difference and even gets stuff out of my pores, but I'm still getting used to the massage side (think it helps with puffiness). Overall, I'm really happy I got it and I'll never go back to anything else

reviews.headline: First rate
reviews.comments: Since I started using this brush, I've seen huge progress with my problematic skin. I have fewer breakouts, and it's no longer flaky. The brush is incredibly soft, but it still does the jobâ€”cleansing away all impurities. It's also super easy to clean, which is important to me. I love the pulsations; they're so relaxing. My face is on its way to becoming spotless!

reviews.headline: very good
reviews.comments: I love that I don't have to be careful while washing my face, because this one is waterproof and I'm messy. It really does a good job when it comes to skin cleansing and I can see and feel that my pores are clear and able to breathe. Over a period of one month, my complexion cleared out (I wasn't aware that not every brush is this hygienic). It is worth every penny for sure

reviews.headline: Fantastic
reviews.comments: This brush is super soft and gentle, yet it gets the job done. My face feels so smooth, clean, and soft like never before. I'm so happy I finally found something that doesn't cause breakouts but actually benefits my skin. The amazing pulsations and massages have worked wonders on my skin. I absolutely love it and can't imagine going anywhere without it!

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: Recently upgraded to this beauty and been super happy with it. My skin is really sensitive and this one has the softest silicone bristles that i have ever tried yet! Super gentle easy to use and removes all the excess oil and dirt from my face. I use with or without app, super travel friendly and compatible. After each use my skin always feels really firm and soft and my breakouts happen way less. Great investment and will always be a part of skincare routine.

reviews.headline: such a pleasure
reviews.comments: The bristles are even softer compared to previous range and the way it cleanse even my pores is amazing! Huge difference and my complexion has cleared out totally. I love it and the massage side is perfect for applying my face cream. Perfect for traveling too

reviews.headline: I would pay even more
reviews.comments: The way this brush manages to clean my skin is almost unreal and I love how soft my skin gets after doing the treatment and even my pores are cleaner than ever. The massage side isn't the reason why I bought this brush, but I have to say that I use it daily and I like how it boosts my circulation. Overall - amazing

reviews.headline: out of this world
reviews.comments: Double cleansing is mandatory for my oily skin type and I just can't believe how luna 4 is gentle at the same time and it manages to clean even my pores (especially t zone, nose area) and I can definitely notice the difference when it comes to applying moisturizer after cleansing

reviews.headline: what an upgrade
reviews.comments: Luna mini 2 was my favorite but I had to get this one and I'm happy I did, because it is an absolute pleasure, next to being very effective - my skin is super clean, after proper cleansing the rest of my routine absorbs way better and overall - I can honestly recommend it because it delivers results

reviews.headline: A Staple in My Routine
reviews.comments: My nose would always flake under my makeup, but now I always get my skin consistently smooth before makeup application. Do you absolutely NEED the Foreo in your routine? No. Does it help to exfoliate and clean your skin better? My personal opinion is that it does. I've been using this brand for years now and I'll never go back. This tool is worth the investment if you're skincare obsessed.

reviews.headline: Fantastic device!
reviews.comments: Never had a better cleanse! So deep and relaxing. The brush is lightweight and very comfortable to hold. Bristles are very gentle and combined with pulsations provide such a great cleanse. Can't imagine my skincare ritual with this brush now.

reviews.headline: perfect
reviews.comments: Out of this world - that's what luna 4 is! I have tried almost everything on the market, but my skin is really sensitive and damaged skin barrier was something I was dealing with often. It is worth investing in quality, for sure, because I have solved my problem. The bristles are gentle, hygienic and the pulsations help skin cleansing process.

rollup.name: LUNA 4 Smart Facial Cleansing & Firming Device for Sensitive Skin
